fixes.name: Cost Price (Estimate)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted row-level subtraction to a calculated column by mapping Tableau column references to DAX table column syntax: [Sales] -> 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Sales], [Profit] -> 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]. The expression has only row-level fields and no aggregations or parameters, so it is a calculated column.
